alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 4:51AM EST until December 16 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects, including holiday decorations, or bring them into a safe location prior to the onset of winds. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
